requirements.text: Use elegant cursive typography for love messages/headings (while maintaining readability) and update the document title in the HTML head to reflect the Rose Day dedication to Ashvena.

requirements.text: Provide optional calm romantic background music with a user-controlled play/pause toggle (do not autoplay on load).
acceptanceCriteria: There is a visible play/pause (or music on/off) control.
Music does not autoplay; it starts only after user interaction.
Toggling reliably plays/pauses and does not spawn multiple audio streams.

constraints: Frontend files under immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if an upgrade requires state migration.
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
nonGoals: Do not add user accounts, Internet Identity login flows, or any backend data persistence for the messages (keep it purely frontend unless required).
Do not implement real-time or multiplayer features.
Do not integrate third-party auth providers or external databases.
